name: Visual C# Script
summary: Learn about .CSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Roslyn program that runs CSX files as scripts is named rcsi.exe. This program is part of the Roslyn package, which can be installed using the NuGet service in Microsoft Visual Studio.

description: Developer file written in Visual C# Script, a C# API developed by Microsoft under the codename The Roslyn Project; used for developing components in C# that can run on-demand as scripts with the Roslyn framework.
